publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3699.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Scotch Beef—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3699) in the name of Mr Andrew Arbuckle, insert at end "and believes that Liberal Democrat and Labour ministers could and should have acted sooner to alleviate the plight of Scottish beef farmers."

S2M-3699.1 Mr Brian Monteith: Scotch Beef—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3699) in the name of Mr Andrew Arbuckle, insert at end "and believes that Liberal Democrat and Labour ministers could and should have acted sooner to alleviate the plight of Scottish beef farmers."
